review: I love this product!!! I never even knew these streaming sticks existed, but I'm now in love. If you already have a Netflix, Hulu, or even a Amazon Prime account, but don't have a smart tv then this is really up your alley. My dad couldn't even believe that you could do so much on a device that was only a one time fee of $40. I consider myself to be very technologically savvy, but I am not very good at setting things up (I.E. computers, DVD players, game systems etc.). I tend to leave the set up process for my dad or brother to do, but this thing was so easy to set up! I had it up and running with 15 minutes after just 5 simple steps. I would totally recommend this product. :)
author: Alaina
